mapper.select:
select id,`name`,buildingId,floor,`number`,`position`,category,nature,peopleNum,linkman, phone,operator,expenses,expirationDate,bandwidth,serviceType,status,legal,lineNum,lineType, lineOpenDate,lineStatus,groupCode,groupGrade,userId,`type`,longitude,latitude,ctime, expensesName,orderTime,memberRole,memberRoleRealNum,memberExpensesName from tb_consumer where 1=1
and buildingId in
#{item}
and userId in
#{item}
and `name` like concat('%',#{name},'%')
order by id desc
select count(1) from tb_consumer where buildingId=#{buildingId}
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_consumer (`name`,buildingId,floor,`number`,`position`,pic,category,nature,peopleNum,linkman, phone,operator,expenses,expirationDate,bandwidth,serviceType,status,legal,lineNum,lineType, lineOpenDate,lineStatus,groupCode,groupGrade,userId,`type`,longitude,latitude,ctime, expensesName,orderTime,memberRole,memberRoleRealNum,memberExpensesName) values
(#{item.name},#{item.buildingId},#{item.floor},#{item.number},#{item.position},#{item.pic},#{item.category},#{item.nature},#{item.peopleNum},#{item.linkman}, #{item.phone},#{item.operator},#{item.expenses},#{item.expirationDate},#{item.bandwidth},#{item.serviceType},#{item.status},#{item.legal},#{item.lineNum},#{item.lineType}, #{item.lineOpenDate},#{item.lineStatus},#{item.groupCode},#{item.groupGrade},#{item.userId},#{item.type},#{item.longitude},#{item.latitude},now(), #{item.expensesName},#{item.orderTime},#{item.memberRole},#{item.memberRoleRealNum},#{item.memberExpensesName})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
buildingId = VALUES(buildingId), floor = VALUES(floor), `number` = VALUES(`number`), `position` = VALUES(`position`), pic = VALUES(pic), category = VALUES(category), nature = VALUES(nature), peopleNum = VALUES(peopleNum), linkman = VALUES(linkman), phone = VALUES(phone), operator = VALUES(operator), expenses = VALUES(expenses), expirationDate = VALUES(expirationDate), bandwidth = VALUES(bandwidth), serviceType = VALUES(serviceType), status = VALUES(status), legal = VALUES(legal), lineNum = VALUES(lineNum), lineType = VALUES(lineType), lineOpenDate = VALUES(lineOpenDate), lineStatus = VALUES(lineStatus), groupCode = VALUES(groupCode), groupGrade = VALUES(groupGrade), userId = VALUES(userId), `type` = VALUES(`type`), longitude = VALUES(longitude), latitude = VALUES(latitude), expensesName = VALUES(expensesName), orderTime = VALUES(orderTime), memberRole = VALUES(memberRole), memberRoleRealNum = VALUES(memberRoleRealNum), memberExpensesName = VALUES(memberExpensesName), ctime = now(),
